content: chain 1 single_crochet in same single_crochet and in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet next 2 single_crochet together *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet decrease repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 50 single_crochet round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around 50 single_crochet round 18 slip st loosely in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends copyright 2017 2005 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
